sections.text: Security is polite. The word ‘malpractice’ lands heavier than the cuffs. The hospital remembers what it needs to.

choices.label: Return to Main Menu

sections.text: A promotion comes with a transfer. New halls. New expectations. Familiar faces fade as doors close behind you.

choices.label: Return to Main Menu
